entry.title: BMAX: pricing “sats now vs sats later” via a mining sharechain (no L1 changes, no custodians, no oracles)
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems there has been a misunderstanding. Without the actual content of an email or specific details regarding the points raised and the idea in question, I cannot provide a summary or extract information as per the guidelines you've provided. If you have specific content or an email you'd like summarized according to these rules, please share the details or the text, and I'll be glad to assist.
